CoGro.title: CoGro
CoGro.l_desc: CoGro is a website made for collaborators looking for collaborators in the same niche.

DishAlchemy.title: Dish-Alchemy
DishAlchemy.l_desc: DishAlchemy is a website where you can deep dive into what makes that dish tick.

HealSync.title: Heal Sync
HealSync.l_desc:
Healsync is a Personal Health Assistant to track your symptoms as well as get suggestions about your health, it uses Google's Gemini API as it's base to make data driven suggestions based on the weather around you, any ongoing outbreaks around you, and many more. 
 It was selected in Google's Regional bootcamp as well

Dharti.title: Dharti
Dharti.desc: Made for Smart India Hackathon, using React
Dharti.l_desc: Dharti finds you the closest E-Waste facility to get rid of your old PC parts, or anything 'E' related.

pp.l_desc: My first website which taught me a lot of things.
